short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost Your Business with the WhatsApp Automation Bulk Sender Tool!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use WhatsApp Automation Tool to connect with your customers by sending bulk messages.

Features
● Send personalized message, picture, video and document
● Send bulk WhatsApp message from excel
● Send to group members 1 by 1
● Save your own WhatsApp promotion message template
● Customizable sending interval
● Current sending progress
● Pause and resume at any time
● Export sending result list
● One-click retry failed

Try the safest wa sender, send bulk messages on WhatsApp and speed up your WhatsApp marketing now!

If you like WA Bulk Message Sender, show us more love with a nice review. It really helps.

WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. WADesk is an independent project and has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
long.zh_CN:
使用 WhatsApp 批量发送信息，与客户建立联系。

功能介绍
● 发送个性化信息、图片、视频和文档
● 从 excel 批量发送 WhatsApp 消息
● 逐一发送给群组成员
● 保存自己的 WhatsApp 促销信息模板
● 自定义发送间隔
● 当前发送进度
● 随时暂停和继续
● 导出发送结果列表
● 一键重试失败

现在就试用最安全的WA群发器，在WhatsApp上群发消息，加快您的WhatsApp营销速度！

如果您喜欢 WA 短信群发器，请给我们更多的爱与好评。这真的很有帮助。

WhatsApp 是 WhatsApp Inc. WADesk 是一个独立项目，与 WhatsApp 或 WhatsApp Inc.
